S.FORM: Michel Temer Misiel Taymil I 1940 a miheca saka 9 folad saka 23 a romi'ad masofoc ci Misiel Taymil(Michel Temer), malamikomoday a tamdaw. O Sawara'an no kitakit no Brazil anini i ci Michel Temer, patirengan a romi'ad i 2016 a miheca saka 8 folad saka 31 a romi'ad. misaparod O kahofocan ni Michel Temer iti i Tietê no Seng PawLo, o fa'inayan a wawa ni Nakhoul "Miguel" Elias Temer Lulia ato ci March Barbar Lulia, 1925 a miheca malinah ko Maloni a tinsokiw (Ikiris a sowal :Maronite Church; kowapin a sowal: ) no Lipanen (Ikiris a sowal : lebanon; kowapin a sowal: ) a tayra to i Pasi (Ikiris a sowal:Brazil; kowapin a sowal: ). lalamod Ci Michel Temer atoya sa'ayaway a fafahi ci Maria Célia Toledo i, tatoloay ko fafahiyan a wawa nangra, Luciana (1969),Maristela (1972) ato Clarissa (1974).Saka tosa a fafahi ci Masera Teterseci, cecay ko fainayan wawa ci Eduardo itini i Longtong a hofocen. 2002 a miheca masaso'araw cangra itini i kasaopoan no kayki, maangoha cangra, kaka ni Misel to sepat polo ira ko tolo a mihecaan ci Maseraan, itini to 2003 a miheca saka pito folad 26 a romi'ad pataloma' cangra. polong ko laloma'an nangra i lalimaay ko tamdaw. mamikowan pitooran
